predicate.note: Frames file for 'administer' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Worse , it [*EXP*-4] remained to a well-meaning but naive president of the United States [*] to administer the final infamy upon those who [*T*-272] fought and died in Vietnam .

those who [*T*-272] fought and died in Vietnam

example.name: unspecified subject
example.text: The idea would be [*] to administer to patients the growth-controlling proteins made [*] by healthy versions of the damaged genes .
